languages.text: "Сначала они неплохо справлялись — помогли мне закрыть пространственные врата, подавив их охранные системы. Я привлекал их к охоте на ксеносов, которых приговорила Иремерисс. Но они начали вынюхивать, а это было неприемлемо. Торбальда я еще мог контролировать, подкидывая ему цели пособлазнительнее, а вот стая Зловещий вой..."

"They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."
languages.original_text: "Сначала они неплохо справлялись — помогли мне закрыть пространственные врата, подавив их охранные системы. Я привлекал их к охоте на ксеносов, которых приговорила Иремерисс. Но они начали вынюхивать, а это было неприемлемо. Торбальда я еще мог контролировать, подкидывая ему цели пособлазнительнее, а вот стая Зловещий вой..."

traits.locale_text: "They were doing fine at first — helped me to close the dimensional gates by suppressing their security system. I made them hunt the xenos that were condemned by Yremeriss. But they started to sniff around, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him some more sneaky targets, but a pack of Famehungry..."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "They were doing fine at first — helped me to close the dimensional gates by suppressing their security system. I made them hunt the xenos that were condemned by Yremeriss. But they started to sniff around, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him some more sneaky targets, but a pack of Famehungry..."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "They were doing fine at first: they helped me close the dimensional gates by suppressing their security systems. I made them hunt the xenos that were condemned by Yremeriss. But they started to sniff around, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him some more sneaky targets, but a pack of Famehungry—"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "They were doing fine at first: they helped me close the dimensional gates by suppressing their security systems. I made them hunt the xenos that were condemned by Yremeriss. But they started to sniff around, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him some more sneaky targets, but a pack of Famehungry—"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "They were doing quite well at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I made them hunt the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Les Loups se sont montrés utiles au début : ils m'ont aidé à fermer le portail dimensionnel en submergeant ses systèmes de sécurité, puis je les ai chargés de chasser les xénos condamnés par Yremeryss. Cependant, ils ont fini par essayer d'en savoir plus sur mes plans, ce qui était bien évidemment inacceptable. Je pouvais contrôler Thorbald en lui donnant des cibles plus alléchantes, mais la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires... »
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."

traits.locale_text: « Les Loups ont fait du bon travail au début : ils m'ont aidé à fermer le portail dimensionnel en submergeant ses systèmes de sécurité. Je les ai chargés de chasser les xénos condamnés par Yremeryss, mais ils ont fini par essayer d'en savoir plus sur mes plans, ce qui était bien évidemment inacceptable. Je pouvais contrôler Thorbald en lui donnant des cibles plus alléchantes, mais la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires... »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Al principio fueron útiles. Los Lobos me ayudaron a cerrar el portal dimensional sobrecargando sus sistemas de seguridad. Les encargué dar caza a los xenos que señalaba Yremeryss, pero acabaron por indagar más de lo debido, y eso era inaceptable. Podía controlar a Thorbald con los objetivos más tentadores, pero la jauría del Aullido Torvo...».
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio, funcionaba bien: me ayudaron a cerrar los portales dimensionales suprimiendo sus sistemas de seguridad. Les puse a dar caza a los xenos que Yremeriss señalaba como enemigos. Pero empezaron a husmear por donde no debían, y eso era inaceptable. Podía controlar a Thorbald enviándole tras objetivos más esquivos, pero toda una manada de Hambriento de Fama...».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “他们一开始干得相当不错。他们突破了敌人的防线，帮我关掉了次元门。在那之后，我让他们四处猎杀被伊芮梅莉斯指定为目标的异形，可那群野狼却伸着鼻子到处乱闻，我不能接受这样的结果。我可以给索巴德指派难以追查的目标，让他始终有事可做。不过，怒嚎者狼群——”
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."

traits.locale_text: “他们一开始干得相当不错。他们突破了敌人的防线，帮我关掉了次元门。随后，我让他们四处猎杀被伊芮梅莉斯指定为目标的异形，但那群野狼却伸着鼻子，到处乱闻，我不能接受这样的结果。我可以给索巴德指派难以追查的目标，让他始终有事可做。不过，渴名者狼群——”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Anfangs waren sie eine Hilfe. Die Wolves haben mir geholfen, das Dimensionstor zu schließen, indem sie die Sicherheitssysteme überwältigt haben. Ich habe ihnen aufgetragen, die von Yremeryss verurteilten Xenos zu jagen. Doch irgendwann wurden sie zu neugierig, und das war inakzeptabel. Ich konnte Thorbald kontrollieren, indem ich ihm verlockendere Ziele bot, doch das Baleful-Howl-Rudel ..."
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."

traits.locale_text: "Anfangs lief alles gut. Sie haben mir geholfen, die Dimensionstore zu schließen, indem sie ihre Sicherheitssysteme unterdrückt haben. Ich habe sie die Xenos jagen lassen, die von Yremeryss verdammt wurden. Doch sie haben angefangen, herumzuschnüffeln, und das war inakzeptabel. Ich konnte Thorbald kontrollieren, indem ich ihm ein paar listigere Ziele zugewiesen habe, doch ein Rudel der Famehungry-"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「彼らは当初、貴重な戦力だった。ウルフたちはセキュリティシステムを圧倒し、超次元の門を閉じる上で役に立ってくれた。彼らには、イレメリスの非難を受けた異種族を狩る任務を与えた。だが、やがて彼らは詮索をし始めたのだ。それを許容することはできなかった。トールバルドはさらに魅力的なターゲットを与えることで制御できたが、破滅の咆哮の連中は…」
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは当初、貴重な戦力だった。ウルフたちはセキュリティシステムを圧倒し、超次元の門を閉じる上で役に立ってくれた。彼らには、イレメリスの非難を受けた異種族を狩る任務を与えた。だが、やがて彼らは詮索をし始めたのだ。それを許容することはできなかった。トールバルドはさらに魅力的なターゲットを与えることで制御できたが、破滅の咆哮の連中は…」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Başlarda benim için birer mal gibiydiler. Kurtlar, güvenlik sistemlerini baskılayarak boyutsal geçici kapatmama yardım ettiler. Onlara Yremeryss'in lanetlediği zenoları avlama görevini verdim. Nihayetinde bir şeyleri merak etmeye başladılar ve bunu kabul edemezdim. Thorbald'ı daha zorlayıcı rakipler sunarak kontrol edebiliyordum ama Uğursuz Uluma sürüsü..."
languages.original_text: "They were an asset at first. The Wolves helped me close the dimensional gate by overwhelming its security systems. I tasked them with hunting the xenos condemned by Yremeryss. But eventually they started prying, and that was unacceptable. I could control Thorbald by giving him more tempting targets, but the Baleful Howl pack..."
